Texts.Eng:
Extracted from Capriole flowers. A heavy class-A narcotic.
^cyan;+^white;20% ^cyan;Energy Regen^gray;, ^cyan;Heavily Intoxicated^gray;, ^red;-^white;30 ^red;Defense^gray;, ^red;Insanity^reset; (220s) ^blue;Madness Gain^reset; 3
Texts.Chs:
从跳跃花中提取。一种强效的A类麻醉剂。
